notes: Renovated older unit with artistic/bohemian style featuring exposed wooden beams, traditional Chinese carved woodwork on mezzanine level, and a mix of vintage and modern furniture. Significant baby safety concerns: steep internal stairs to loft/mezzanine with no railing visible, glass coffee table, open shelving units with climbable features, and glass partition walls throughout. Limited natural light visible in interior shots though there is a balcony with sliding doors.
